actions.description: The giff makes two Morningstar attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Morningstar

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d12 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Double-Barreled Musket

actions.description: The giff moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
actions.name: Move

actions.description: The giff ends the frightened condition on itself and each creature of its choice that it can see within 30 feet of it.
actions.name: Rallying Cry

actions.description: The giff makes two Morningstar attacks or one Double-Barreled Musket attack.
actions.name: Weapon of Choice (2 Actions)

specialTraits.description: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.
specialTraits.name: Firearms Knowledge

specialTraits.description: If the giff fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
